text: Thanks! Interesting concept I came up with last night: what if discoveries themselves were a platform? By that I mean, what if anyone could make and submit a discovery? The adidas discoveries would be editors content
That might be interesting. The discoveries may lose credilibty then. The value according to adidas is that discoveries are developed by pros

Contrast may make that more evident. I would see it playing out like most platforms. Many would suck, but would soon be pushed to irrelevance based on ratings/reviews. A few enterprising individuals would take advantage of opportunity and make name for themselves. Platform + ranking algo + collective would provide curation. Value of Compass platform would grow significantly. Can't find one example of a successful service/platform that only has the owner producing content.
Totally agree that their gut reaction would be what you said. They would be wrong though ;-)

I think it's an interesting idea for the collective. Agree with Ivan though because it is developed by pros . BUT it could be an additional element, not attached to discoveries. Like: "hey I am doing these .... when walking to work and I feel much more energized during the day ... maybe it works for you too ... " -type of thing?
